data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ellenberger, Sieghard, Fanti, Fabrizio (2019): New Cretaceous soldier beetle (Cantharidae) from Burmese amber with preserved coloration on the elytra. Zootaxa 4609 (3): 594-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4609.3.13|2 occurrences
